meanings: (지정해 말하여) be somehow, be a certain way
병원에 관한 표현 How about going to see a doctor?
병원에 관한 표현 Why don't you go see a doctor?
실용회화-맑은날씨 How will the weather be tomorrow?

vlive.korean: 어떨까? What do you think? 듣기 View video 브릿지TV (BRIDGE TV) : 두드림(Do Dream) EP3-2 고백
귀여워, 쿠크 오면 어떨까? Cute. What will Boo like when Kuk is here? 듣기 View video TWICE : ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ
vlive.english: Cute. What will Boo like when Kuk is here?

vlive.korean: 뭔가 그 노래도 다시 한번 녹음하면 어떨까? How about we record that song one more time? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 🐯🎂💖✌️
vlive.english: How about we record that song one more time?

vlive.korean: 앞으로 1년간 저와 사계절을 함께 해보시면 어떨까요? What about enjoying four seasons with my new singles? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : 규현 [PROJECT : 季] 인터뷰. #Dreaming 그리고 #여름
vlive.english: What about enjoying four seasons with my new singles?

vlive.korean: 솔라시도니까 게임 방송을 도전해보고 싶다고 하는데 어떨까요? She is thinking about trying a game show. What do you think? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 용콩별콩 뒤집어지는 LIVE
vlive.english: She is thinking about trying a game show. What do you think?

examples.korean: Suppose we take a later train? 발음듣기 우리가 (그보다) 더 뒤의 기차를 타는 건 어떨까요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Suppose we take a later train? 발음

examples.korean: I thought we could go out tonight. 발음듣기 우리가 오늘 밤에 외출을 하면 어떨까 생각했어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I thought we could go out tonight. 발음

examples.korean: I thought we might go to the zoo on Saturday. 발음듣기 우리가 토요일에 동물원에 가면 어떨까 하고 생각했어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I thought we might go to the zoo on Saturday. 발음

examples.korean: Why not have the dish of the day? 발음듣기 오늘의 요리를 한번 시켜 보는[먹어 보는] 게 어떨까? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Why not have the dish of the day? 발음

examples.korean: Many people have unreal expectations of what marriage will be like. 발음듣기 많은 사람들이 결혼 생활이 어떨까에 대해 비현실적인 기대를 갖는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Many people have unreal expectations of what marriage will be like. 발음
